title: 36 Hours: 36 Hours in Rio de Janeiro
text: BING NEWS: 36 Hours in Rio de Janeiro For decades, Rio de Janeiro has evoked a distant fantasyland of skimpy bathing suits and Carnival spectacle wedged between the sea and a riotous upheaval of tropical mountains.
